inds.name: Juakali
inds.description: Juakali Workforce creates job opportunities by connecting clients with skilled workers from the informal sector.They are widely spread in Kibra

inds.name: entrepreneuership
inds.description: Kibera is a very efficient economy, focused on providing products and services to lower income people. People are always innovating new ways to get capital and earn daily living.

inds.name: Boda
inds.description: Bodaboda operators(Motorcycle taxi) who are destined to change their lives through coming together and addressing different problems affecting their en-devours. This industry is dorminated by the youths mostly but few elderly people mostly men and few women.
